description:
GUARANTEED MONEY BACK!!!!!!!!!!!  YOU HAVE NOTHING TO LOSE ONLY TO GAIN!!!!  JOIN NOW AND START MAKING THE INCOME YOU DESERVE......

Updated April 27, 2016


The One Course That Teaches it All, From how to install Wordpress to Earning Money Online Blogging.

Below is an overview of the many different objectives students will be learning throughout the duration of this course, How To Earn Money Blogging $4K Monthly & Up Using Wordpress.

Students Will Learn:

  • Learn To Setup Wordpress On New Domain URL
  • Understand How To Optimize Blog For SEO Purposes
  • Learn the True Definition of Wordpress Blog
  • Learn To Use Yoast Plugin For Best SEO Purposes
  • Learn Several Different Techniques For Receiving FREE Traffic
  • Learn To Use Genesis FrameWork
  • Learn the Difference Between Wordpress Pages & Post
  • Learn to Setup Google Webmaster Account
  • Understand Wordpress Dashboard and How to Install Wordpress Plugins
  • Proper techniques for setting up a blog correctly to receive most traffic
  • Learn how to Submit site to Different Search Engines
  • Create a Sitemap and Submit It to the different Search Engine Directories
  • Learn Several Different strategies for monetizing A Blog
  • How To build a Responsive And Mobile site Simultaneously
  • How To Add a Forum To Wordpress Site
  • How To Build an Image Gallery
  • How To Create a Site Menu or NavBar
  • How To Add Google Map To Site
  • How To Choose Proper Permalink Structure and Proper Setup
  • How To Optimize Site Titles and Meta Descriptions
  • How To Use Affiliates to monetize Blog such as Amazon Associates Program
  • Learn To Setup Google Adsense and Adsense Alternatives

Course Info Below:

Blogging for money requires knowledge and a well thought out plan. It's not as simple as buying a domain name and throwing up a blog to start earning loads of money. This is the reason so many people give up when the money don't start rolling in every day.

Students get Our Full Disclosure Teaching Method for Blogging Secret Success in this course.

In this course we demonstrate techniques we have used and still currently use to grow our blog traffic to well over 3 Million page views of FREE Google Traffic over the past year without any promotions or buying any type of ads whatsoever.

We keep this course fresh and up to date by adding New Content Monthly

What Students Will Learn:

Section 1. Setting Up a Blog

Students will:

  • Learn the official definition of a Blog
  • Intro to Genesis Framework
  • How To Setup Wordpress on New Domain URL
  • Learn how to setup blog using Genesis Framework
  • How To Install Wordpress Inside CPanel
  • Section 2. Choosing Host Provider
  • Students will:
  • Learn Best Hosting Providers for Wordpress Sites
  • Different methods for getting FREE Traffic

Section 3. Different Ways to Monetize Blogs

  • Students Will:
  • Learn Top Methods To earn Revenue on Blog
  • Monetizing Tips for receiving FREE Traffic
  • Different advertising Methods to Use
  • Learn to use Google Webmaster Tools

Section 4. How To SEO Optimize Blog

  • Students will:
  • Learn How To Yoast Plugin and Best Settings
  • How To Optimize Post Titles, Tags, and Meta data for SEO
  • Learn Difference Between Post and Pages in Wordpress
  • Learn how to use Google Adwords
  • Learn to setup Google Adsense account

Section 5: Bonus: Affiliate Programs Part 1

  • Students will:
  • Learn best affiliates for new blogs or beginners
  • Learn how to use Amazon Associates for increasing blog revenue
  • Google Adsense Alternatives

Section 6 Bonus: Affiliate Programs Part 2

Students will:

  • Learn how to use Affiliate programs for earning most revenue
  • Top Five Ways to Monetize Blogs

Section 7 Video Revenue

  • Students will:
  • Additional iPhonecaptain Revenue Proof
  • Understand how adding Youtube video in a post can be very profitable
  • Understand Importance of keeping a schedule
  • Learn how doing Giveaways can improve traffic and Social media followers

Closing

  • Course Wrap Up
  • Quiz testing for understanding

This course currently has a Five Star Rating with over 50 reviews. Below is what two of the students think about our course, Blogging Secrets Course.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Testimonials Below:

Reviews left by students who have completed course and become successful Blogging:

Mitch's Course does an awesome job and delivers what is promised. I have already made $20 my first week

Making money online has always been a dream of mine. I have spent hundreds of dollars on courses and information which promised to show how to make money. Those were all gimmicks. However, Mitch's Course does an awesome job and delivers what it is promised. I have already made $20 my first week. That's more than I have ever made before so I feel I owe it all to this course and instructor

Best blogging strategy

This course gave me the motivation I need to finally start my blog! In addition, I now know what to blog about, how I can get more blog traffic, and how to use my blog to market my business. I highly recommend this course for anyone thinking about starting a blog, or who has just started a blog but wants to grow it.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

In this Course I will teach you How to Earn Money Blogging. I will show you step by step methods for getting your traffic Free which will provide revenue constantly. You can quickly begin earning money. The more effort and work you put in the more revenue you will earn. Stop procrastinating and enroll today so you too can start earning extra money from home. This new income can easily be transformed into your sole provider.

It's truly amazing way to earn money without having a boss on your butt all the time or deadlines.

Students get Our Full Disclosure Teaching Style Methods for Our Blogging Secret Success: How We Earn $4K Monthly in this course.

Learn How To Blog For Money. All the best tips for earning money blogging. We even disclose which affiliate programs to join to earn the most revenue. We will share our strategies we currently use for earning up to $4K monthly.
title: How to Launch and Monetize a Blog Using WordPress
